workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class AuthorityPermissionsRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<AuthorityPermission>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.AuthorityPermissionsRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<AuthorityPermission>

    @RestController
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/authority-permissions",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=AuthorityPermission.class)
public class AuthorityPermissionsRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<AuthorityPermission>

      • getInternalAuthority

        @GetMapping(path="/{id}/internal-authority")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'InternalAuthority\', \'get\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getInternalAuthority(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long id)

      • postInternalAuthority

        @PostMapping(path="/{id}/internal-authority",
             consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'InternalAuthority\', \'post\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postInternalAuthority(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @Validated(value=PersistenceValidation.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               InternalAuthority internalAuthority,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives a new InternalAuthority and reassign this existing AuthorityPermission to it.
        Parameters:
        id - Existing AuthorityPermission to be reassigned to.
        internalAuthority - New InternalAuthority.
        Returns:
        JSON InternalAuthority as a HATEOAS Resource with this AuthorityPermission assigned.

      • putInternalAuthority

        @PutMapping(path="/{id}/internal-authority",
            consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'InternalAuthority\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> putInternalAuthority(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           @Validated(value=MergingValidation.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           InternalAuthority internalAuthority,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives an existing InternalAuthority and reassign this existing AuthorityPermission to it.
        Parameters:
        id - An existing AuthorityPermission to be reassigned to.
        internalAuthority - An existing InternalAuthority.
        Returns:
        JSON InternalAuthority as a HATEOAS Resource with this AuthorityPermission assigned.

      • deleteInternalAuthority

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/internal-authority/{internalAuthorityId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'AuthorityPermission\', \'delete\') and hasPermission(\'InternalAuthority\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteInternalAuthority(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @PathVariable(name="internalAuthorityId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Long internalAuthorityId)
        Deletes this AuthorityPermission (as it cant exist without InternalAuthority) and removes it from the given AuthorityPermission.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the AuthorityPermission to be deleted.
        internalAuthorityId - InternalAuthorityId this AuthorityPermission has to be removed from.
        Returns:
        The InternalAuthority without this AuthorityPermission.

      • getWorkshopEntitiesTypes

        @GetMapping(path="/{id}/entities-types")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'AuthorityPermission\', \'get\') and hasPermission(\'WorkshopEntityType\', \'get\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getWorkshopEntitiesTypes(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="pageSize",required=false,defaultValue="${page.size.default}")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="pageNum",required=false,defaultValue="1")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer pageNum,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(name="order-by",required=false,defaultValue="${default.orderBy}")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(name="order",required=false,defaultValue="${default.order}")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String order)
        Parameters:
        id - AuthorityPermission.ID
        pageSize - min=0 (WorkshopRestController.getDEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE() will be returned), max=WorkshopRestController.getMAX_PAGE_SIZE()
        pageNum - min=1
        orderBy - Property name this WorkshopEntityTypes has be ordered by.
        order - ASC or DESC
        Returns:
        List of Resources<Resource<WorkshopEntityType>> of this AuthorityPermission

      • postAuthorityPermissionWorkshopEntityType

        @PostMapping(path="/{id}/entities-types",
             consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'WorkshopEntityType\', \'post\') and hasPermission(\'AuthorityPermission\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postAuthorityPermissionWorkshopEntityType(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            @Validated(value=PersistenceValidation.class)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            WorkshopEntityType workshopEntityType,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives a new WorkshopEntityType, persist it and adds to this AuthorityPermission
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.CREATED and the persisted WorkshopEntityType instance.

      • putAuthorityPermissionWorkshopEntityType

        @PutMapping(path="/{id}/entities-types",
            consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'WorkshopEntityType\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'AuthorityPermission\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> putAuthorityPermissionWorkshopEntityType(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        @Validated(value={MergingValidation.class,javax.validation.groups.Default.class})
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        WorkshopEntityType workshopEntityType,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives an existing WorkshopEntityType, adds to this AuthorityPermission and update both ones.
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.ACCEPTED and the updated WorkshopEntityType instance.

      • deleteTask

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/entities-types/{workshopEntityTypeId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'WorkshopEntityType\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'AuthorityPermission\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteTask(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            @PathVariable(name="workshopEntityTypeId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.Long workshopEntityTypeId)
        Just removes a given WorkshopEntityType from a given AuthorityPermission
        Parameters:
        id - AuthorityPermission.id
        workshopEntityTypeId - WorkshopEntityType.id
        Returns:
        The HATEOAS Resource WorkshopEntityType without this AuthorityPermission.
